      • getStep

        int getStep()
        Returns:
        how many simulation steps this monitor updates the graphics

      • isRealTime

        boolean isRealTime()
        Returns:
        true if this monitor is trying to draw in realtime

      • setDrawLinks

        void setDrawLinks(boolean b)
        Parameters:
        b - if true, this monitor draws the links between nodes

      • setEffectStack

        void setEffectStack(List<Effect> l)
        Parameters:
        l - the EffectStack to use

      • setRealTime

        void setRealTime(boolean rt)
        If enabled, the monitor tries to synchronize the simulation time with the real time, slowing down the simulator if needed. If the simulation is slower than the real time, then the display refreshes fast enough to keep the #DEFAULT_FRAME_RATE.
        Parameters:
        rt - true for the real time mode

      • setStep

        void setStep(int step)
        Parameters:
        step - How many steps should be computed by the engine for the display to update the graphics
